message:
Guys, Do any one have experience before about integration with Facebook and twitter or any social networks .i am using already this script in url     http://adodson.com/hello.js/ .
But i faced problem that i can't save authentication of user always .It saved authentication of user in local PC not in the server .Any solutions?
story: Mahmoud Elsayed Abd Elaty created a poll in Egyptian Geeks.

data.message: What do you mean can't save authentication !?

if i integrated with Facebook as example in my PC ,when open same application in different PC status of authentication not saved i need to reintegrate again .Problem is authentication saved in local PC not in the server itself. If you have different solution tell me ya abo sala7 :D?
i know i need to put application for integration in my server but i don't know how?

i was using hybridauth but what u want need saved login info for accounts in server (you can't with javascript API) if you want to make this for exist accounts i think there is other APIs for php (Like social Hub Apps)
if u don't need full API you can use Php_Curl But u must parse retutned Html code by hand
http://allenprogram.blogspot.com/2012/04/php-auto-login-facebook-using-curl.html

Unfortunately i am using ASP.net not PHP 
Thanks dude for your help

Mahmoud Elsayed Abd Elaty authentication through oauth is just a hand shake technique through FB credentials for example this is through a cookie over your local PC using pricipal technique not access token,, saving the returned value is your task of course ..
Mahmoud Elsayed Abd Elaty Try to have a look on https://hossamhassan47.wordpress.com/2013/01/05/real-world-oauth-using-asp-net-mvc-4/ it may help you.
